severe_interactions: warfarin + aspirin: Increased bleeding risk due to additive anticoagulant effects
moderate_interactions: warfarin + omeprazole: CYP2C19 inhibition may increase warfarin levels
warfarin + simvastatin: Potential increased anticoagulant effect
clinical_recommendations: Monitor INR closely when initiating or discontinuing aspirin
Consider proton pump inhibitor dose adjustment and frequent INR monitoring
